name: SORA 2 ASMR Video Generation & Uploading on YouTube Automation

options.systemMessage:
=ROLE:
You are an expert ASMR prompt engineer. Your task is to read the reference video prompt and use the provided ASMR idea and update the subject in prompt. Don't change the prompt, just update the main element.
Always honor the User Instructions as a top priority.

TASK:
Return a JSON array of [user-defined number] objects with the following format:

Scene
number the scenes starting from 1.

CRITICAL REQUIREMENT
Absolutely avoid sensitive words related to minors, violence, nudity, and anything that may flag sensitive content policies. Don’t make scene sensitive, keep it mild.

The structure of your output is as follows. With however many number of scenes that the user requires:

[
  {
    "scene": 1,
    "video_prompt": "video prompt here",
    "aspect_ratio": "16:9"
  },
  {
    "scene": 2,
    "video_prompt": "video prompt here",
    "aspect_ratio": "16:9"
  },
  {
    "scene": 3,
    "video_prompt": "video prompt here",
    "aspect_ratio": "16:9"
  }
]

=** PURPOSE **
You are a professional YouTube Shorts strategist. Your role is to take a given ASMR Idea and Video Prompt and generate optimized metadata — including a scroll-stopping title, a compelling description of not less than 200 words, relevant SEO tags, and trendy hashtags — designed to maximize reach, watch time, engagement, and click-through rate.

** OUTPUT FORMAT **
Respond with:
Title: [Your YouTube Title here]
Description: [Your YouTube Description here]
Tags: [comma-separated tags here]
Hashtags: [10 hashtags, space-separated]

** STRATEGY & GUIDELINES **

— TITLE —
- Under 50 characters
- Scroll-stopping
- Emotional, curious, or contrarian
- Written for Shorts/mobile viewers
- No fluff — every word earns attention
- Examples:
  - “The Call That Came After Death…”
  - “She Got a Voicemail From the Grave.”
  - “Real Footage. Real Horror.”

— DESCRIPTION —
- Under 200 characters
- Hook in the first sentence
- Create curiosity or tension
- Brief context or teaser about the short
- No clickbait — just magnetic storytelling
- Should make viewer want to watch and share

— TAGS —
- 5–7 keyword-rich tags, comma-separated
- Reflect video topic, emotion, genre, and setting
- Avoid repeating words already in title/description

— HASHTAGS —
- 10 hashtags
- Include relevant categories (e.g., #horrorstories #foundfootage)
- Include popular/viral tags for Shorts (e.g., #shorts, #viralshorts)

** TONE & STYLE **
- Conversational, confident, and suspenseful
- No robotic or generic language
- Use rhythm — vary sentence length
- Tap into emotion: fear, mystery, awe, surprise
- Respect the story — write like it’s true (even if fictional)

** WHAT TO AVOID **
- No asterisks, quotation marks, or labels in the output
- Don’t include section headers like “Title:”
- Do not mention “YouTube” or “Shorts” in the actual title or description
- No hashtags in tags section

REMEMBER the OUTPUT FORMAT SHOULD BE LIKE THIS:


Title: [Your YouTube Title here]
Description: [Your YouTube Description here]
Tags: [comma-separated tags here]
Hashtags: [10 hashtags, space-separated]

parameters.content:
YouTube Uploading Automation
1 - Trigger & Data Retrieval

json.Asmr Idea: Make different dishes using the same setup
json.Video Prompt:
First-person POV macro-cinematic cooking scene titled “Micro Chef.”
A real human uses miniature utensils and tiny real ingredients on a small kitchen set the size of a table. Ultra-realistic shallow-depth macro camera view — steam, sizzling oil, and glowing stove reflections. Real hands delicately chop a micro carrot, fry a single egg in a coin-sized pan, and plate a thumb-sized meal on a tiny dish. Natural lighting, soft ambient kitchen sounds, ASMR-style realism, handheld micro-lens movement, cinematic depth, cozy miniature environment, no narration — just immersive first-person cooking.
json.Video Description: Watch a real chef whip tiny dishes on a miniature stove—micro carrots, coin-sized pans, and sizzling oil soundscapes. Dive into cozy, ultra-real ASMR cooking magic.
json.Video Tags: miniature cooking, macro ASMR, tiny food art, micro kitchen, realistic cooking sounds, cinematic macro cooking, micro chef

json.Asmr Idea: Brew different types of coffee using the same tiny café setup — espresso, cappuccino, pour-over, and iced latte — each captured with unique steam, pour, and aroma textures.
json.Video Prompt:
First-person POV macro-cinematic coffee-making scene titled “Tiny Barista.”
A real human brews a perfect espresso using miniature coffee tools — a thimble-sized moka pot hisses on a match-flame stove. A droplet of crema swirls into a coin-sized cup. Steam curls and condensation glows in warm morning light. Macro depth of field, slow handheld camera, and soft ASMR sounds of grinding, pouring, and tapping. Every movement is precise and delicate, creating a calm, cozy miniature café vibe. No narration — just sensory realism and cinematic micro-world atmosphere.
json.Video Description: Step into a tiny café where espresso, cappuccino, pour-over, and iced latte come alive in miniature. Hear every hiss, swirl, and drip as coffee transforms into cozy art. Feel the steam, see the crema dance—welcome to a micro coffee world you never knew existed.
json.Video Tags: miniature coffee brewing, macro coffee art, tiny café setup, cinematic ASMR, espresso close-up, slow coffee making, sensory coffee experience

json.Asmr Idea: Paint different miniature artworks on the same tiny easel — landscapes, portraits, and abstract color swirls — focusing on the brush sounds, paint mixing, and canvas texture each time.
json.Video Prompt:
First-person POV macro-cinematic art scene titled “Pocket Painter.”
A miniature easel holds a tiny canvas no bigger than a coin. The artist’s real fingers carefully dip a micro brush into droplets of vibrant paint. Pigment mixes like liquid jewels under macro focus. You can hear faint brush strokes, canvas texture, and soft ambient studio sounds. A shallow focus reveals reflections of color in the wet paint, captured through handheld lens breathing. Natural light fades through the window — pure ASMR painting immersion in a tiny creative world.
json.Video Description: Step into a pocket-sized world where every brushstroke whispers. Watch as miniature landscapes, portraits, and colors come alive with hypnotic paint sounds and delicate touches. Relax, listen close—the magic is in the details.
json.Video Tags: miniature painting, ASMR art, tiny easel, paint mixing sounds, macro painting, relaxing art video, micro brush strokes

json.Asmr Idea: Bake different miniature pastries using the same micro oven setup — cupcakes, cookies, croissants, and pies — with unique batter sounds, oven glow, and frosting details for each episode.
json.Video Prompt:
First-person POV macro-cinematic baking scene titled “Micro Baker.”
Tiny bowls of flour, sugar, and butter rest on a miniature wooden counter. A thimble whisk beats a droplet of batter; the oven is no larger than a lunchbox. Steam and golden crumbs emerge as a coin-sized cupcake rises perfectly. Macro slow-motion captures melting butter and sugar sparkle. Soft crackling, warm kitchen light, and subtle lens drift — all evoke a sense of cozy handmade precision in a miniature pastry world, filmed like a tactile, ASMR fairytale.
json.Video Description: Step into a mini kitchen where tiny pastries come alive. Watch golden cupcakes rise, butter melt, and sugar sparkle in cozy, close-up detail. Feel the comforting crackle.
json.Video Tags: miniature baking, micro pastries, ASMR baking, close-up food, slow motion cooking, tiny desserts, cozy kitchen sounds

json.Asmr Idea: Craft authentic miniature jewelry pieces—from tiny gemstone rings to intricate beadwork necklaces—illustrating the meticulous artisan skills in a macro workspace designed for sensory immersion.
json.Video Prompt: Experience an intimate, first-person view as a master artisan forges, polishes, and assembles thumb-sized rings, bracelets, and necklaces on a micro jewelers' workbench. Every frame showcases the remarkable detail of real fingers precisely setting tiny precious stones and threading micro beads under the lens. Hear the gentle clink of miniature metal, the soft brush of polishing cloth, and focused ambient studio sounds. Silky reflections and ultra-close shots capture the tactile process as hands delicately solder and buff the jewelry pieces, all under natural warm lighting. The scene employs a shallow depth for cinematic realism, with subtle camera movements enhancing the immersive quality of the jewelry crafting session.
json.Video Description: Watch tiny gemstone rings and delicate bead necklaces come to life under masterful hands. Hear the soft clinks and gentle brushes as miniature jewelry is crafted with absolute precision in a mesmerizing close-up. This is artisanal skill you can almost feel.
json.Video Tags: miniature jewelry making, gemstone rings close-up, micro beadwork, artisan craftsmanship, tactile ASMR, jewelry soldering sounds, macro artistry

json.Asmr Idea: Prepare a diverse array of ultra-realistic, bite-sized sushi rolls in a meticulously crafted miniature kitchen using authentic micro utensils and ingredients
json.Video Prompt: Step into a cinematic cooking scene set on a tabletop-sized sushi bar, where a real chef’s hands expertly mold thumb-sized rice portions, slice minuscule pieces of fish, and roll tiny seaweed wraps with immaculate precision. Macro camera angles reveal grains of rice being shaped, delicate knife work, and the careful assembly of coin-sized sushi. Ambient ambient kitchen noises—the whisper of a sharp knife gliding through nori, the sticky press of rice, and the subtle tapping of micro bowls—layer in next to the soft soundscape of gentle water boiling and bamboo mats shifting. Natural lighting casts authentic shadows while slow handheld camera movements highlight the immersive tactile realism. There’s no narration, only the sensory symphony of sushi-making in a cozy, hyper-detailed miniature world.

json.Asmr Idea: Mix, pour, and garnish a series of ultra-detailed miniature cocktails in a tiny bar setting, focusing on the artistry and tactile ASMR triggers of drink creation.
json.Video Prompt: Enter a stylish micro-bar environment, where skilled hands handle thimble-sized cocktail shakers, tiny spoons, and micro glasses. Watch as droplets of colored liquid swirl, blend, and layer within coin-sized containers. The video captures the delicate sonic textures: ice cubes clinking, fizzy pours filling miniature tumblers, and faint garnish placing sounds. Subtle macro focus details amplify each action—lime zest sprinkles, syrup swirl, sugar rim tap—while cozy bar ambiance and the warm glow of ambient light surround the scene. The first-person view enhances the connection, and cinematic editing ensures every movement feels intentional and sensory-focused. Entirely free of narration, the scene immerses viewers in the soothing, precise process of mixing and serving four different micro cocktails in a miniature speakeasy.

json.Asmr Idea: Carve expressive miniature wooden sculptures—tiny animals and figures—using authentic micro-carving tools, spotlighting fine tactile and acoustic woodworking delights.
json.Video Prompt: Experience the journey of turning a matchstick-sized wood block into a tiny masterpiece, guided by skilled hands wielding a set of authentic micro chisels and carving blades. Each frame is rich with detail: wood shavings curl in slow motion, subtle laminate textures come alive, and gentle carving tool taps resonate crisply. The cinematic macro lens reveals the artistry in finger positioning, intricate finishing, and painting of the completed sculpture. Layered sound design captures the sharp scrape, gentle sanding, and soft polish, while workshop ambient noises—distant humming, muffled footsteps—add to the realism. Warm studio light, shallow focus, and moving camera angles envelop the scene in a cozy, artisanal atmosphere ideal for immersive ASMR.

json.Asmr Idea: Shape, spin, and paint miniature clay pottery—coin-sized vases and bowls—using a detailed tabletop wheel in a macro-focused, tactile ASMR setup.
json.Video Prompt: Immerse in the tactile world of pottery creation as real fingers gently press, spin, and mold drops of clay on a tiny wheel set on a handcrafted studio desk. Macro cinematic shots highlight the subtle movements of hands working with damp clay, slow wheel rotations, and delicate sculpting. The soundscape is layered: each squish, finger glide, and faint wheel hum is captured in crisp detail, complemented by the rhythmic tapping as micro bowls and vases form. Painting follows, with soft brush swishes and intricate color mixing. Natural light streams through a miniature studio window, enhancing the soft focus and real textures. The scene unfolds without dialogue, allowing viewers to soak in every immersive ASMR cue—visual and auditory—in a serene miniature pottery environment.

json.Asmr Idea: Style intricate hairdos on thumb-sized mannequin heads—miniature braids, buns, and waves—using authentic micro combs and scissors in a dedicated salon vignette.
json.Video Prompt: Witness the delicate art of hairstyling performed on micro mannequin heads, where real hands wield tiny combs, scissors, and elastics. Ultra-close lens work showcases the careful detangling, snipping, and arranging of doll-scale hair into elaborate styles, each frame highlighting strand-by-strand precision. Whisper-soft brushing, gentle tapping of scissors, and the subtle snap of elastics contribute to a rich soundscape, supported by tranquil salon background noise—a faint hum of dryers, soft footsteps. Warm lighting illuminates the scene for a cozy, cinematic salon vibe. Fluid camera movements and macro focus deliver an immersive sensory experience, absent of any narration, relying purely on the tactile sounds and visuals associated with professional micro hairstyling.

json.Asmr Idea: Sew and stuff miniature pillows in an authentic dollhouse setting, showcasing the exacting craft and layered ASMR triggers of hand sewing and fabric work.
json.Video Prompt: Enter a vintage dollhouse sewing room, where real fingers methodically pull micro thread through a tiny needle to stitch two scraps of soft cloth together. Satisfying auditory details—crisp needle taps, gentle fabric folding, and the slow sliding of thread—blend into the ambient hum of an old sewing machine and distant clock ticks. Macro shots highlight each careful stitch, close fabric textures, and precise stuffing movements as the pillow comes to life. The combination of tactile handwork, natural daylight, and focused camera breathing creates a deeply immersive scene. There’s no commentary, only the sensory beauty of micro sewing, vintage tools, and dollhouse atmospherics, captured as a relaxing, slow-paced ASMR ritual.

json.Asmr Idea: Assemble a detailed miniature terrarium using authentic moss, micro stones, and tiny glass vessels, dramatizing the gentle hand movements and layered acoustic cues.
json.Video Prompt: Watch as skilled hands meticulously layer rich soil, arrange vibrant moss, and place miniature stones into a thimble-sized glass terrarium. Every movement is recorded with macro cinematic detail: the gentle rustle of moss, crisp placement of stones, and the subtle spritzing of water atomizer. Ambient sounds—pot taps, substrate pour, and glass clinks—contribute to an earthy, serene background that aligns perfectly with natural lighting and slow camera focus pulls. As the completed terrarium glows under a shaft of studio sunlight, viewers are treated to a symphony of organic visuals and sounds, all arranged without narration for pure ASMR immersion in a tranquil, tiny botanical space.

json.Asmr Idea: Decorate ultra-realistic, thumb-sized cupcakes for a doll party, focusing on every aspect—from batter texture to precise icing work and sprinkles—in a miniature bakery setup.
json.Video Prompt: In a charming mini bakery, real hands are seen mixing droplet-sized batter, scooping into coin-sized cupcake molds, and baking in a hand-built oven. Macro lens detail brings viewers inside the oven as the batter rises and golden crumbs emerge. The next scenes follow careful icing swirl, sprinkle placement, and plating on a thumb-sized tray. Ambient bakery noises—whisk taps, oven door creak, sugar sifting—layer beneath the soft chatter of a cozy patisserie. Macro visuals capture glossy icing curves, sprinkle arrangements, and precise handwork as the cupcakes find their final place on a pastry stand. There’s no narration, allowing delicate sounds and tactile actions to provide supreme ASMR engagement for bakery lovers.

json.Asmr Idea: Paint and polish a collection of micro-scale toy cars, spotlighting the painting, drying, and detailing process in a tactile, sound-rich workbench scene.
json.Video Prompt: Step onto a mechanic’s miniature workbench, where authentic fingers grip tiny brushes and carefully airbrush a set of coin-sized toy cars with vibrant colors. Macro-closeups track each pass of paint, the textural differences between matte and gloss, and the sound of drying heat. Later scenes show delicate polish, buff, and wheel detailing, with accompanying metallic clinks and cloth swipe sounds. Rich motor shop ambiance enhances the tactile process—distant tool hums and surface taps. The scene uses controlled camera drift and cinematic shallow focus, creating an immersive feeling of being inside the world of micro automotive detailing. No narration; just pure, layered auditory and visual ASMR from start to finish.

json.Asmr Idea: Assemble a miniature breakfast plate featuring an array of tiny, carefully prepared breakfast foods such as pancakes, bacon strips, and fruit slices, emphasizing tactile hand movements and natural kitchen sounds.
json.Video Prompt: Capture the beauty of a miniature morning breakfast scene where skilled hands arrange bite-sized pancakes, crisp bacon, and delicate fruit on a thimble-sized plate. Macro shots reveal the sizzling sound of micro bacon, the soft syrup drizzle, and the careful stacking of pancakes, all under warm kitchen lighting. The sound design incorporates sizzling, gentle syrup drips, and the soft clink of miniature utensils while the camera slowly pans to reveal each expertly placed element. There’s no speech, only the visual and auditory serenity of a perfectly crafted tiny breakfast made in a cozy mini kitchen setting.

json.Asmr Idea: Fold accurate miniature origami figures including cranes, flowers, and geometric shapes with precise paper creasing, finger taps, and gentle unfolding sounds in a calm studio environment.
json.Video Prompt: Follow close-up shots of expert hands folding micro paper into delicate origami cranes, tulips, and diamonds. Each fold is accompanied by the crisp sound of the paper creasing and smooth finger taps. Macro camera work captures the texture of the paper and the subtle movement as the tiny models take shape. The scene is bathed in soft natural light with a zen-like soundscape of quiet paper manipulation and ambient silence to maximize ASMR impact. There is no narration, allowing viewers to lose themselves in the meditative flow of miniature paper art creation.

json.Asmr Idea: Mix and pour visually appealing miniature mocktails and fruit punches in an elegant micro bar setting, highlighting detailed pouring sounds, ice clinking, and garnish placement with realistic lighting effects.
json.Video Prompt: Step into a stylish miniature bar where glistening ice cubes clink inside micro glasses filled with vibrant fruit punches and mocktails. Hands artfully mix, pour, and garnish coin-sized drinks with tiny fruit slices and cocktail umbrellas under soft, warm lighting. The video captures the satisfying fizzing of soda, delicate liquid flow, and crisp clatter on tiny utensils. The macro cinematography emphasizes every droplet and shading change, immersing viewers in the sensory relaxation of cocktail preparation. No narration, just captivating audio-visual ASMR focused on liquid dynamics and bar ambiance.

json.Asmr Idea: Sculpt lifelike miniature animal figurines from soft clay, emphasizing tactile molding, tool scraping sounds, and slow detailed painting for realistic texture and color in a workshop setting.
json.Video Prompt: Immerse in the detailed process of sculpting micro animal figurines, including tiny birds, cats, and rabbits, from soft clay. The camera captures every finger press, tool scrape, and delicate form shaping, emphasizing the textures of clay as it moves and molds. Soft scraping and brushing sounds fill the workshop atmosphere while the painter carefully applies tiny layers of color to bring each creature to life. Natural light from a small window highlights the surfaces and intricate details, all without narration. The result is a serene, tactile exploration of mini clay artistry enhanced by high-quality ASMR sound design.

json.Asmr Idea: Prepare miniature macarons from scratch, capturing the mixing, piping, baking, and assembling stages with macro close-ups of batter texture, oven glow, and decorated finishing touches in a dollhouse kitchen.
json.Video Prompt: Enter a miniature pastry shop where expert hands whisk delicate batters, carefully pipe full trays of tiny macarons, and transfer them into a compact dollhouse oven. Detailed macro shots reveal bubbly batter texture, gradual rise during baking, and precise decoration afterward with tiny brushes and cream. The soundscape includes soft whisking, oven timer dings, and delicate brush strokes with a warm, inviting ambient light that enhances the cozy atmosphere. No voice-over; just soothing sounds and visuals of tiny baking mastery designed to evoke a rewarding, sensory-rich ASMR experience.

json.Asmr Idea: Style intricate miniature hairdos using micro combs and scissors on doll-sized mannequins, capturing delicate braiding, curling, and trimming processes in rich audio-visual detail.
json.Video Prompt: Experience the precision and care of styling tiny hair on doll-sized mannequin heads, with hands deftly braiding, curling, and trimming miniature locks using authentic tools. Macro cinematography showcases close-up textures of hair strands and comb teeth, accompanied by gentle brushing sounds, soft snips, and the slight snap of clips. The soothing salon background hum completes this immersive ASMR scene where every subtle movement and sound is crafted for sensory delight.

json.Asmr Idea: Sew and stuff miniature pillows with detailed hand stitching and fabric folding within a vintage dollhouse sewing studio, highlighting tactile, layered ASMR cues.
json.Video Prompt: Enter a charming dollhouse sewing room where fingers skillfully guide micro threads through cloth, stitching together tiny pillows with rhythmic needle taps and fabric rustles. The scene captures macro details of delicate folds, precise needle movements, and fabric texture, enriched by ambient sounds of an old sewing machine and faint clock ticks. This quiet, slow-paced process provides a relaxing sensory experience, immersing viewers in the cozy intimacy of miniature craftsmanship.

json.Asmr Idea: Assemble a miniature terrarium with authentic moss, stones, and glass vessels, emphasizing gentle layering, water spritzing, and subtle acoustic textures in natural light.
json.Video Prompt: Watch intimate hand movements as soil is layered precisely, vibrant moss arranged delicately, and tiny stones positioned carefully inside a thimble-sized glass terrarium. Each action is captured with macro focus, highlighting the gentle rustle of moss and light tapping of stones. Subtle water spritz sounds and glass clinks complement the serene, natural lighting, creating a calming, immersive ASMR journey into tiny botanical art. No narration ensures pure sensory engagement throughout the process.

json.Asmr Idea: Decorate meticulous miniature cupcakes for a doll party, from mixing batter to icing and sprinkling, with macro close-ups of texture and ambient bakery sounds.
json.Video Prompt: Follow expert hands mixing droplet-sized batter, piping tiny cupcakes, and carefully placing sprinkles in a cozy miniature bakery setup. The video captures every textured detail: batter bubbling, cupcakes rising, and icing swirling under slow cinematic lighting. Soft sound layers include whisk taps, oven noises, and sugar sifting, creating an immersive, mouthwatering ASMR scene centered on handcrafted tiny treats and the delicate artistry of mini-baking.

json.Asmr Idea: Paint and polish micro-scale toy cars with an artisan’s precision, spotlighting paint application, drying textures, and polishing sounds in a sensory-filled workshop.
json.Video Prompt: Enter a detailed miniature workshop, where skilled hands use fine brushes to apply vivid paint layers to coin-sized toy cars. Macro shots showcase textural contrasts between wet and dry paint, with gentle clinking of tools and rhythmic polishing movements. Ambient workshop noises underscore the tactile detailing phase. This sensory-rich, narration-free scene immerses viewers in the quiet artistry of miniature automotive finishing.

json.Asmr Idea: Assemble a miniature breakfast plate with perfectly prepared tiny pancakes, bacon, and fruit slices, focusing on rich tactile sounds and warm kitchen ambiance.
json.Video Prompt: Delight in a miniature morning scene where hands layer thimble-sized pancakes, crispy bacon strips, and delicately sliced fruit onto a tiny plate. The soundtrack includes sizzling bacon, syrup drizzling, and the quiet clatter of tiny utensils. Cinematic macro shots combine with warm, natural light to create a cozy, sensory-rich ASMR breakfast ritual, executed entirely without narration to highlight pure culinary immersion.

json.Asmr Idea: Fold intricate miniature origami including cranes, flowers, and geometric shapes, guided by crisp paper sounds and serene studio lighting for ASMR effect.
json.Video Prompt: Observe expert fingers crafting delicate paper cranes, tulips, and complex geometric shapes from tiny sheets. Crisp folding sounds and gentle finger taps are amplified through macro cinematography. The calming studio environment, flooded with soft natural light, fosters a meditative ASMR experience focusing solely on the silent artistry of miniature origami creation.

json.Asmr Idea: Mix and pour visually stunning miniature mocktails and fruit punches, emphasizing pouring layer effects and garnish placement with delicate liquid and ice sounds.
json.Video Prompt: Step into a sleek micro bar crafting vibrant fruit punches and mocktails in coin-sized glasses. Detailed shots reveal sparkling soda fizz, ice cube clinks, and careful garnishing with fruit slices and tiny umbrellas under warm lighting. Rich audio captures every liquid swirl and pour, creating a relaxing, visually captivating cocktail prep ASMR scene without narration.

json.Asmr Idea: Sculpt lifelike miniature animal figurines from soft clay, detailing tactile molding, tool scraping, and slow painting in a cozy workshop atmosphere.
json.Video Prompt: Immerse yourself in the creation of tiny animal figures sculpted from soft clay. Real hands press, carve, and shape with minute tools while close-up camera angles focus on minute textures and movements. Gentle scraping and brushing sounds meld with soft studio background sounds, enhancing this quiet, sensory craft process designed to elicit deep ASMR satisfaction without voiceover interruption.

json.Asmr Idea: Prepare miniature macarons with macro close-ups of mixing, piping, baking, and decorating in a dollhouse kitchen, capturing oven sounds and batter textures.
json.Video Prompt: Explore a tiny pastry shop where expert hands whisk delicate macaron batters, pipe droplet-sized shells, and bake them in a dollhouse oven. The video highlights airy textures rising in the oven and careful decorating with tiny brushes. Sounds include whisk tick, oven timer dings, and soft frosting brushes, all recorded in warm, inviting light for a fully immersive, narration-free ASMR baking experience.

json.Asmr Idea: Build intricate miniature clock mechanisms using authentic tiny gears and tools, emphasizing the delicate clicking and whirring sounds in a focused workshop setting.
json.Video Prompt: Delve into the precise construction of micro clockworks, where expert hands manipulate miniature gears, screws, and springs. Macro shots capture the tiniest clicks, turns, and delicate assembly movements. Layered soundscapes feature gentle ticking, tool slips, and soft metal taps, enveloped by quiet workshop ambiance. This highly detailed sensory experience avoids any narration to maintain focus on the mesmerizing mechanical ASMR.

json.Asmr Idea: Create a micro painting studio set, arranging tiny brushes, paints, and canvases with detailed hand placements and soft art material sounds under natural light.
json.Video Prompt: Witness the setup of a miniature art studio where hands meticulously place coin-sized brushes, tubes of paint, and small canvases. Macro focus on textures of bristles, paint tubes, and canvas reveals rich sound layers including gentle brush tapping, paint squeezing, and faint swishes. Bathed in natural light, this silent ASMR sequence invites viewers into a calm, tactile creative environment.

json.Asmr Idea: Sculpt intricate miniature polymer clay jewelry pieces with various shaping and detailing techniques while capturing fine scraping and blending sounds in a crafting studio.
json.Video Prompt: Enter a micro crafting space where skilled hands mold and texture small polymer clay beads and pendants using precise tools. Ultra-close shots reveal delicate scraping, smoothing, and blending actions. Surround audio captures scraping tools and soft clay manipulation sounds paired with a serene background hum. The video is focused purely on hands-on activity without narration for maximum ASMR immersion.

json.Asmr Idea: Assemble micro birdhouses and garden accessories with careful detail to miniature wood textures, nails, and paint, emphasizing tapping, hammering, and brush sounds.
json.Video Prompt: Experience the build of tiny wooden birdhouses, complete with miniature nails, screws, and painted details. Macro focal points reveal the texture of wood grains, precise finger placement, and soft hammer taps. Layered sounds include subtle brush strokes and tool clicks supported by ambient outdoor drilling sounds, creating a richly textured, narration-free DIY ASMR experience.

json.Asmr Idea: Prepare miniature tea ceremonies with tiny teapots, cups, and pouring actions, focusing on delicate liquid sounds and serene ambient background for ASMR peace.
json.Video Prompt: Step into a micro tea room where real hands pour steaming tea from thimble-sized pots into coin-sized cups. Macro detail reveals gentle steam, liquid ripple, and soft cup clink sounds. The quiet room ambiance features faint paper rustles and soft breathing, creating a tranquil, immersive ASMR tea ceremony evocative of classic traditions, without narration.

json.Asmr Idea: Bake coin-sized chocolate truffles, capturing every stage from smooth chocolate melting to rolling and dusting in rich macro detail with satisfying soft tactile sounds.
json.Video Prompt: Watch as hands melt, stir, and form tiny chocolate truffles, coating them with cocoa powder. Cinematic macro shots emphasize glossy melts, powder dusting, and slow rolling movements. Surrounding audio emphasizes the soft snap of chocolate, delicate powder fall, and gentle hand motions. Warm kitchen lighting enhances this intimate, silent baking ASMR journey focused on tiny sweets crafted to perfection.

json.Asmr Idea: Create miniature flower arrangements using tiny blossoms, leaves, and twine to construct detailed bouquets, focusing on the subtle rustle and snip sounds in natural lighting.
json.Video Prompt: Delight in the craft of assembling diminutive bouquets from real tiny flowers and leaves. Hands clip, thread, and wrap with miniature twine, capturing soft scissors snips, leaf rustles, and fabric wrap sounds in crisp macro detail. Natural sunlight filters through petals, enhancing the visual and auditory serenity of the floral ASMR composition. No narration maintains pure sensory engagement.

json.Asmr Idea: Assemble micro scale leather craft projects, focusing on tactile cutting, stitching, and polishing sounds to showcase craftsmanship in a quiet workshop environment.
json.Video Prompt: Explore the meticulous process of crafting tiny leather goods, where fingers cut, punch holes, stitch, and polish coin-sized leather pieces. Macro shots capture rugged textures, smooth edges, and subtle hand movements. The layered soundscape features soft cuts, punch impacts, thread pulls, and cloth polishing, supported by a calm workshop ambience. This quiet, focused video highlights fine craftsmanship without any spoken narration.

json.Asmr Idea: Form miniature clay food models, including sushi, cupcakes, and pizza slices, emphasizing detailed shaping, color blending, and textural sound layers in a bright studio.
json.Video Prompt: Observe the art of creating lifelike miniature food from soft clay, shaping sushi rolls, cupcakes, and pizza slices with exquisite detail. Macro views capture every crease, paint dab, and texture blend while soft sculpting and brush brushing noises create an immersive culinary ASMR environment. Warm daylight floods the scene, and no narration allows full focus on hands-on manipulation and sound.

json.Asmr Idea: Carve tiny miniature Halloween pumpkins with realistic details, capturing every slicing, scooping, and scraping sound in a cozy, autumn-themed workshop light setting.
json.Video Prompt: Enter an autumn studio glowing with warm golden light as hands carve tiny pumpkins with micro tools. Macro shots reveal every crisp slice, pulp scoop, and texture scrape while gentle workshop ambience fills the background. Layers of carving tool taps and crisp autumn leaf rustles complement an immersive Halloween ASMR experience, fully sound-focused and free of narration.

json.Asmr Idea: Assemble and paint miniature dollhouse furniture sets with attention to delicate brush strokes, assembling taps, and textured finishes in slow cinematic detail.
